settings.name: auto_equip
settings.description: Automatically equips any received armor or left/right weapons.

settings.name: lock_equip
settings.description: Lock the equipment slots so you cannot change your armor or your left/right weapons. Works great with the Auto-equip option.

settings.name: no_weapon_requirements
settings.description: Disable the weapon requirements by removing any movement or damage penalties, permitting you to use any weapon early.

settings.name: randomize_weapons_level
settings.description: Enable this option to upgrade a percentage of the pool of weapons to a random value between the minimum and maximum levels defined.

values.name: basic
values.description: Only weapons that can be upgraded to +10

values.name: epic
values.description: Only weapons that can be upgraded to +5

settings.name: randomize_weapons_percentage
settings.description: Determines the percentage of weapons in the pool to be upgraded if randomize weapons level is toggled.

settings.name: min_levels_in_5
settings.description: The minimum upgraded value of a weapon in the pool of weapons that can only reach +5.

settings.name: max_levels_in_5
settings.description: The maximum upgraded value of a weapon in the pool of weapons that can only reach +5.

settings.name: min_levels_in_10
settings.description: The minimum upgraded value of a weapon in the pool of weapons that can only reach +10.

settings.name: max_levels_in_10
settings.description: The maximum upgraded value of a weapon in the pool of weapons that can only reach +10.

settings.name: late_basin_of_vows
settings.description: Force the Basin of Vows to be located as a reward of defeating Pontiff Sulyvahn. It permits to ease the progression by preventing having to kill the Dancer of the Boreal Valley as the first boss.

settings.name: no_spell_requirements
settings.description: Disable the spell requirements permitting you to use any spell.

settings.name: no_equip_load
settings.description: Disable the equip load constraint from the game.

settings.name: enable_progressive_locations
settings.description: Randomize upgrade materials such as the titanite shards, the estus shards and the consumables.

settings.name: enable_dlc
settings.description: If enabled, content from Ashes of Ariandel and Ringed City will be used. (Both are required in order to enable.)
